languages.text: "Садись же, Домин, и слушай: "Да начнется церемония сплетения". {n}Тонким лезвием Кибелла вырезает на полу замысловатый символ, а затем поджигает в нем небольшой пергаментный сверток, пропитанный благовониями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Садись же, Домин, и слушай: "Да начнется церемония сплетения". {n}Тонким лезвием Кибелла вырезает на полу замысловатый символ, а затем поджигает в нем небольшой пергаментный сверток, пропитанный благовониями.{/n}

languages.text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Садись же, Домин, и слушай: "Да начнется церемония сплетения". {n}Тонким лезвием Кибелла вырезает на полу замысловатый символ, а затем поджигает в нем небольшой пергаментный сверток, пропитанный благовониями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin.'" {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

"Sit down now, Enim, and listen. Within the walls of this temple, within the stillness of the sacred cradle His whisper resounds, 'Let the Tue'ri ceremony begin'. {n}Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor with a fine blade, then sets fire to a small piece of incense-laden vellum.{/n}

"Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin.'" {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

"Sit down now, Enim, and listen. Within the walls of this temple, within the stillness of this sacred cradle, His whisper resounds with the words: 'Let the Tue'ri ceremony begin'. {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small piece of incense-laden vellum and sets it alight.{/n}

"Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

"Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin.'" {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

"Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

"Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

languages.text: "Setzt Euch nun, Domin'{name}, und hört mir zu. Möge die Zeremonie der Verschlingung beginnen." {n}Mit einer scharfen Klinge ritzt Kibellah ein komplexes Muster in den Boden. Dann holt sie ein in nach Weihrauch duftendes Pergament geschlagenes Bündel hervor und entzündet es.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Setzt Euch nun, Domin'{name}, und hört mir zu. Möge die Zeremonie der Verschlingung beginnen.".{n}Mit einer scharfen Klinge ritzt Kibellah ein komplexes Muster in den Boden. Dann holt sie ein in nach Weihrauch duftendes Pergament geschlagenes Bündel hervor und entzündet es.{/n}

"Setzt Euch nun, Domin'{name}, und hört mir zu. Möge die Zeremonie der Verschlingung beginnen.".{n}Mit einer scharfen Klinge ritzt Kibellah ein komplexes Muster in den Boden. Dann holt sie ein in nach Weihrauch duftendes Pergament geschlagenes Bündel hervor und entzündet es.{/n}

languages.text: «Siéntese y escuche, Domin'{name}. Que comience la ceremonia de entrelazamiento». {n}Con una hoja afilada, Kibellah talla un complejo símbolo en el suelo. Después, saca un pequeño fardo envuelto en papel impregnado de incienso y le prende fuego.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Siéntese y escuche, Domin'{name}. Que comience la ceremonia de entrelazamiento». {n}Con una hoja afilada, Kibellah talla un complejo símbolo en el suelo. Después, saca un pequeño fardo envuelto en papel impregnado de incienso y le prende fuego.{/n}

languages.text: 「座って聞きなさいドミン{name}。結びつけの儀式を始めましょう。」{n}キベラは鋭く研がれた刃を使って、床に精巧なシンボルを彫り込む。次に、香りのついた羊皮紙に包まれた小さな束を取り出し、火を点ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「座って聞きなさいドミン{name}。結びつけの儀式を始めましょう。」{n}キベラは鋭く研がれた刃を使って、床に精巧なシンボルを彫り込む。次に、香りのついた羊皮紙に包まれた小さな束を取り出し、火を点ける。{/n}

languages.text: “坐下来，秘者{name}。仔细聆听，让盘绕祭礼开始吧。”{n}绮贝菈抽出一把精心打磨过的匕首，在地板上刻了个复杂的符号。之后，她取出一小捆带着熏香味道的羊皮纸，点燃了里面包裹的东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “坐下来，秘者{name}。仔细聆听，让盘绕祭礼开始吧。”{n}绮贝菈抽出一把精心打磨过的匕首，在地板上刻了个复杂的符号。之后，她取出一小捆带着熏香味道的羊皮纸，点燃了里面包裹的东西。{/n}

languages.text: « Asseyez-vous, Domin'{name} et écoutez. Que la cérémonie de jumelage commence. » {n}Kibellah grave un symbole complexe au sol à l'aide d'une lame soigneusement affûtée, puis sort un petit paquet enveloppé dans un parchemin saturé d'encens avant d'y mettre le feu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Asseyez-vous, Domin'{name} et écoutez. Que la cérémonie de jumelage commence. » {n}Kibellah grave un symbole complexe au sol à l'aide d'une lame soigneusement affûtée, puis sort un petit paquet enveloppé dans un parchemin saturé d'encens avant d'y mettre le feu.{/n}

languages.text: "Domin'{name}, hemen otur ve dinle. Büküm töreni başlasın." {n}Kibellah, büyük bir hassasiyetle bilenmiş bıçağı kullanarak zemine çetrefilli bir sembol kazıyor. Ardından tütsülenmiş parşömene sarılı ufak bir bohça yaparak onu ateşe veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sit down now, Domin'{name}, and listen. Let the ceremony of twining begin." {n}Using a finely honed blade, Kibellah carves an intricate symbol into the floor. She then produces a small bundle wrapped in incense-laden parchment and sets it alight.{/n}
